segments.text: I see this kitchen scene unfolding right before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a woman standing by the sink, carefully drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so focused on that plate, completely oblivious to everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring out of the sink, overflowing onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle is forming around her feet, and she's just standing there in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the two kids over by the cabinets on the left.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on a wobbly stool, reaching into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got a plate in his other hand, probably to hold the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing beside him, her hand outstretched like she's waiting for one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem to be sneaking cookies while the mom isn't looking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden outside, all calm and green.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, it's like chaos is about to happen with that tipping stool.
segments.speaker: PAR
